signer.description: signer defines the x/gov module account address or other authority signing the message

denom.description: Denom for the rate limit, as it appears on the rate limited chain When rate limiting a non-native token, this will be an ibc denom

channelOrClientId.description: ChannelId for the rate limit, on the side of the rate limited chain

MsgResetRateLimit.title: Msg Reset Rate Limit
MsgResetRateLimit.description: Gov tx to reset the flow on a rate limit
